display_long_description:
# Enter the Voluverse – Where Reality Meets the Digital World

Welcome to **Voluverse**, the next-generation extended reality (XR) platform offering diverse mixed and virtual experiences. Enjoy artist performances and learn new skills through virtual training sessions with real digital personalities—**volucaps**—on your VR headset from anywhere in the world. With weekly updates, there’s always something fresh to discover.

# What You Can Experience in Voluverse

- **Live Performances in XR**\
  Ever wanted to see artists like **Ladybeard** or **BossHoss** perform on stage? Now you can watch their performances up close.

- **Learn Sports from World Champions**\
  Master basketball shots with **Josh Mayo**, BMX tricks with **Matthias Dandois**, and juggling with guidance from **Felix Hirt**.

- **Step Inside a Virtual Surgery Room**\
  Explore the future of medical training with **Charité**.

- **The Future of News & Weather**\
  Experience **Tagesschau 2030** by German broadcaster **ARD** and see how immersive news and forecasts will look in the future.

- **History & Art in VR**\
  Meet contemporary witnesses, hear their personal stories, and explore digital museums and art exhibits like never before.

- **Explore AI & Digital Experiments**\
  Watch deepfake **Tom Cruise** and see how next-gen 4G vs. 5G volucaps redefine real-time streaming of digital humans.

**Voluverse** is an evolving platform and some content is still developing, so keep an open mind—we’re just getting started!\
\
Download Voluverse now and become part of our community!
